ated Roller Skates: Roller skates that have built-in speakers that play music to match the skater's speed, creating a personalized soundtrack for each person.
Smart Roller Skates: Roller skates that have sensors that track the skater's movements and provide real-time feedback on their technique, helping them improve their skills.
Transformable Roller Skates: Roller skates that can transform into a variety of different designs, such as a car, a boat, or a plane, allowing skaters to glide across different surfaces.
ated Roller Skates: Roller skates that have built-in LED lights that sync with the skater's movements, creating a stunning light show as they move.

Smart Roller Skates: Roller skates that have sensors that track the skater's movements and provide real-time feedback on their technique, helping them improve their skills. They also have built-in GPS, so skaters can track their progress and compete with others online.
